DOC.brief_summary: For patient undergo treatment head neck cancer , study use dynamic contrast-enhanced CT scan try determine lymph node neck contain cancer require surgical removal .
DOC.brief_title: Dynamic Contrast Enhanced Computed Tomography ( CT ) Head Neck Cancer
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Willing provide inform consent ECOG performance status 02 Histologically confirm squamous cell carcinoma ( include variant verrucous carcinoma , spindle cell carcinoma , carcinoma NOS ) head neck Tumor stage : Any ( T1T4 ) Nodal stage : N2 N3 ( â‰¥ 3 cm ) pretreatment image radiotherapy cohort ( high likelihood require neck dissection ) ; N1N3 surgery cohort . N0 admissible T4 tumor . Patient assess head neck multidisciplinary clinic ( assessment radiation oncologist surgeon ) , recommendation definitive chemoradiation therapy ( n=15 ) surgery ( n=15 ) Prior history head neck cancer within 5 year Prior head neck radiation time Metastatic disease , image finding suspicious metastasis Prior invasive malignant disease unless diseasefree least 5 year , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer . Pregnant lactate woman Contraindication DCECT ( e.g . contrast allergy )
